message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $1000000. I'm confident that it will exceed your expectations. Would you like to take a chance and make a great investment?
Thanks, Alice! I'm confident in your judgment and I'll take it. I'm looking forward to seeing if it's as high-quality as you say!
